publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2346 Marilyn Livingstone: Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Awardâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Fife Free Press on winning the Best Paid-For Weekly Newspaper in Scotland 2001 Award, presented by the Newspaper Society, and welcomes the crucial role played by local newspapers in local communities by acting as a focal point for community life; scrutinising local representatives and championing local causes.
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Michael Russell*, Tricia Marwick*, Phil Gallie*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Helen Eadie*, Mike Watson*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Elaine Thomson*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*, Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Cathy Peattie*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Andrew Wilson*, Hugh Henry*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Bill Butler*
S1M-2346 Fife Free Press Best Paid-For Newspaper Of the Year Award (lodged on 23 October 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
